data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernt, Maxwell J., Crampton, William G. R., Orfinger, Alexander B., Albert, James S. (2018): Melanosternarchus amaru, a new genus and species of electric ghost knifefish (Gymnotiformes: Apteronotidae) from the Amazon Basin. Zootaxa 4378 (4): 451-479, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.4.1|15 occurrences
